DIRECTIONS.1: In a 6-quart Instant Pot add chicken, diced tomatoes, broth, hot sauce, and seasonings. Lock lid and set to Pressure Cook on High for 12 minutes.
DIRECTIONS.2: Follow manufacturerâ€™s guide for quick release, making sure to wait until cycle is complete before unlocking and removing lid. Shred chicken with two forks.
DIRECTIONS.3: Use a slotted spoon to serve chicken on tortillas with desired toppings.
